metadata.title: CVE-2023-0414 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Crash in the EAP dissector in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 allows denial ofservice via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
